      boolean move(int dir)
      Entity's function move changes the location of the entity by 1 increment given a direction from 0 to 3, corresponding to east (0), north (1), west (2), and south (3) function makes the assumptions that Map has a function map1.isWall(int vert, int hor), which returns whether the block at the location is a wall or in some other way restricted
